text: Still at present little scientific empirical evidence for the link between NDVI trends and cropland changes is provided for drylands in general and for the Sahel region in particular. Several local scale studies showed a general increase in cropped areas since the 1950s and in recent years a few studies have indicated that cropland has a higher annual NDVI than savanna in Sahelian areas supporting a possible link between cropland expansion cropping intensification and the observed positive trends in NDVI
